column5: Sorry .. just had to share ... its a patent for a dodger ... which never actually made me money ... although when it was licenced to Williams we all thought it would make me rich  .... only Mepps didnt care about dodgers so when they bought Williams that was the end of the story ... at least until now ... anyhow here's the patent  http://patft.uspto.gov/netacgi/nph-Parser?...ry=PN%2F4823495  Call/PM me if you want to buy the rights
